info.title: OX REST API
info.description:
Documentation of the Open-Xchange REST API.

___

parameters.name: context-group
parameters.description: The context group identifying the global DB where the feedback is stored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given after this time is deleted. If not set, all feedback up to -e is deleted.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given before this time is deleted. If not set, all feedback since -s is deleted.

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found, if path is wrong (unknown context group or feedback type). Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

parameters.name: context-group
parameters.description: The context group identifying the global DB where the feedback is stored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given after this time is sent. If not set, all feedback up to -e is sent.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given before this time is sent. If not set, all feedback since -s is sent.

200.description: Export data into a CSV file

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found, if path is wrong (unknown context group or feedback type). Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

Example.description: Export user feedback from 2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 as CSV

parameters.name: context-group
parameters.description: The context group identifying the global DB where the feedback is stored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given after this time is sent. If not set, all feedback up to -e is sent.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given before this time is sent. If not set, all feedback since -s is sent.

200.description: A JSON array containing the stored user feedbacks.

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found, if path is wrong (unknown context group or feedback type). Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

post.summary: Exports user feedback and sends exported data to provided recipients

parameters.name: context-group
parameters.description: The context group identifying the global DB where the feedback is stored.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given after this time is sent. If not set, all feedback up to -e is sent.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given before this time is sent. If not set, all feedback since -s is sent.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: JSONObject with fields "subject" for custom mail subject, "body" for custom mail body, boolean "compress" to compress the mail attachment and "recipients" (an JSON Array containing address, display name and PGP key (if available) for every recipient).

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found, if path is wrong (unknown context group or feedback type). Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

Example.description: Export user feedback from 2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 and send it via mail to user1@example.org and user2@example.org
Example.example:
POST http://localhost:8009/userfeedback/v1/send/default/star-rating-v1?start=1451606400&end=1483228799 {"subject":"User Feedback",
 "body":"User Feedback",
 "compress":true,
 "recipients": [
   {"address":"user1@example.org",
    "displayName":"User 1",
    "pgp_key":"-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----\r\nVersion: BCPG v1.56...."},
   {"address":"user2@example.org",
    "displayName":"User 2",
    "pgp_key":"-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----\r\nVersion: BCPG v1.56...."}
 ]
}

put.summary: Sets an advertisement configuration for a given user by name

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

delete.summary: Remove the current configuration for the user

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

put.summary: Sets an advertisement configuration for a package of a reseller

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

delete.summary: Remove the current configuration for a package of a reseller

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

put.summary: Sets all advertisement configurations for a given reseller

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

put.summary: Sets an advertisement configuration for a given user by id

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

delete.summary: Remove the current configuration for the user identified by userId

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.
